name: Sketchbook Adventure Prototype
description:
Singleplayer
ca. 20 - 50 min

Premise
As chameleons, you have been living peaceful lives within an artists sketchbook as his proudest creations. But suddenly small, sketchy beings called “Scribbles” started to appear more often, stealing all the colors from your beloved home! Will you just sit idly by and watch them wreck havoc or will you take up the call to adventure and find the root of that plague?!

Gameplay
A 2D platformer, in which you go through intricate levels, using colors to progress. These Colors are tied to abilities and limited by corresponding fuel indications.

Features
Speedrun Potential
Beautiful, nostalgic artstyle

Creators
Linus Palm, Alina Schuhmacher, Jasmina Meier
